segments.text: Hey , Jim , you're 15 minutes late . What's up ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I got stuck in a traffic jam .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hurry up , the show is about to start .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It looks like you're very interested in the circus .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I love to see the animal show .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have never seen those before , but since you're so excited it should be good .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Okay , I will go and get some popcorn first .
segments.speaker: S2
